title: things we’re loving right now
itunes:title: things we’re loving right now
description:
Brooke and Danielle are back and getting into what they are loving recently!  The gals have been trying lots of products and new things this summer, and they are discussing everything from skincare favorites, to drinks, clothing, and more!  Be sure to tag @galsonthegopodcast in your listening selfies and screenshots!

What we are loving:

Danielle:

Amazon Workout Set https://bit.ly/3wjb6Dp 
Monday Swimwear Green Bikini 
TOP: https://bit.ly/3pCXOjj  
BOTTOMS: https://bit.ly/3xfHCqU 
Outdoor Voices Exercise Dress https://go.magik.ly/ml/181il/  
Pretty Little Thing Boyfriend Jeans https://go.magik.ly/ml/15xff/  
DryBar Hair Rollers https://bit.ly/34Kp4no   
Lush Dirty Body Spray https://www.lushusa.com/fragrances/body-sprays/dirty/9999907320.html 
Nike Superrep Sneakers https://bit.ly/2U8Kfgn 
Urban Outfitters Orange Shoulder Bag  https://bit.ly/2RwSSjD  

Brooke:

Golde Matcha https://golde.co/products/new-pure-matcha 
Adina’s Jewels Gold Hoops https://rvlv.me/Ytb36X 
Hero Cosmetics Pimple Patches https://amzn.to/3ea1t3U 
Living Proof Dry Shampoo https://bit.ly/3yMhBQM 
Arrae Bloat Supplements https://www.arrae.com/products/bloat 
Lululemon Align Shorts 4 inch https://bit.ly/3yGP7rI 
Casetify Neon Case https://bit.ly/3i4v6o3 
Agolde Parker Jean Shorts https://rvlv.me/JQr44E
